price: "Wanda Ya sanya muku ƙasa shimfiɗa, kuma Ya shigar muku da hanyõyi a cikinta, kuma Ya saukar da ruwa daga sama." Sa'an nan game da shi* Muka fitar da nau'i-nau'i daga tsirũruwa dabam-dabam.
arabic: ٱلَّذِي جَعَلَ لَكُمُ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ مَهۡدٗا وَسَلَكَ لَكُمۡ فِيهَا سُبُلٗا وَأَنزَلَ مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَآءٗ فَأَخۡرَجۡنَا بِهِۦٓ أَزۡوَٰجٗا مِّن نَّبَاتٖ شَتَّىٰ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: alladhī jaʿala lakumu al-arḍa mahdan wasalaka lakum fīhā subulan wa-anzala mina al-samāi māan fa-akhrajnā bihi azwājan min nabātin shattā
